description: Minor Amendment to ref: P091301 dated 2 October 2009 to alter the wording of condition 5 (BREEAM & Code for Sustainable Homes) to enable the ground floor commercial space to meet 'Very Good' level rather than 'Excellent'.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Studies confirming the following shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority:

i)	The student accommodation block shall achieve a BREEAM rating of no less than an 'Excellent' standard.
ii)  The commercial area within the student accommodation block shall achieve a BREEAM rating of no less than an 'Excellent' standard;
iii)	The commercial part of the residential housing block shall achieve a BREEAM rating of no less than a ‘Very Good’ standard;
iv) The residential dwellings shall achieve a Code of Sustainable Homes rating of no less than 'Code 3'.

Two (2) studies shall be provided: 
a)	Study no. 1: A design stage accurate estimate study shall be submitted at pre-construction stage prior to commencement of works on site; and 
b)	Study no. 2: A post-construction study supported by a BRE accreditation certificate, shall be submitted following the practical completion of the development, 6 months following the first occupation.
   
The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, shall be maintained as such thereafter and no change there from shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

The details submitted to the Local Planning Authority on 17/04/2009 pursuant to condition 5i of planning permission reference P082527 [LBI ref: P082527C5i(a)] and approved by the Local planning Authority on 10/06/2009 shall be deemed to be approved for the purposes of this condition.

REASON: In the interest of addressing climate change and to secure sustainable development in accordance with policies Env1 and Env2 of the Islington UDP 2002 and policies: 4A.1; 4A.2; 4A.3 and 4A.9 of the London Plan 2008.
